title: Wright Brothers National Memorial: People
body: People        Wright brothers and colleagues at Kitty Hawk camp, 1901Left to Right: Octave Chanute, Orville Wright, Edward C. Huffaker, Wilbur Wright Wilbur and Orville Wright       Wilbur and Orville Wright are best remembered for making the first successful powered airplane flight at Kitty Hawk, North Carolina in 1903. Their story, however, goes much deeper than that. Come see how two self-taught mechanics from Dayton, Ohio, with the help of family and friends, changed our world forever.                 Sort By: Rating Relevance Recently Updated Title    Show 10 40  per page     Loading results...
